item.description:
MUSEUM OF SCIENCE & Alps IMAX Movie

The forecast calls for a rainey weekend. Instead of staying home join us for a fun day at the Museum of Science in Boston. We are meeting at the museum Sunday morning between 9:00 & 9:15 am in front of the ticket counter. Well behaved kids are also welcome to join!

The plan is spend the day exploring the exhibits. For those that are interested the Alps Imax movie is shown at 1:00 pm and 5:00 pm.

Lunch is planned for 11:30 am at the nearby Cheesecake Factory located inside the Cambridge Side Galleria.

DETAILS:

The Museum of Science is open on Sunday from 9 am to 5 pm.

Admission is $19 for adults and $16 for kids.

Note: To save some cash call your local library and inquire if they have a museum pass. I am picking up one at the local library which will get four people into the museum for $5.00 each!

Re. the ALPS movie show times are 1:00 pm and 5:00 pm.

ALPS (trailer)
http://www.mos.org/me...

Movie is $9 for adults and $7 for kids.

For parking do not park at the museum â€“ EXPENSIVE.

Instead park at the Cambridge Side Galleria and walk a short couple of blocks. Four bucks to park in Boston is a bargain.

Special Low Price Nights, Weekends
anytime Sunday
1 - 10 hours
$3.99

NOTE:
You will need to park in the Lower Garage which has three entrances: Cambridge Side Place, Land Boulevard, and First Street.

The Upper Garage, located on First Street between Best Buy and Sears, does not open until later in the day.

Disclaimer
Your response/signing up for a hike certifies that you have read, understand, and agree with the Disclaimer and things you must know.
item.how_to_find_us: meet inside the museum at the ticket coutner between 9:00 & 9:15 am
item.name: Museum of Science & ALPS IMAX
